metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3805 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
object-path is vulnerable to Improperly Controlled Modification of ObjectPrototype Attributes ('Prototype Pollution')

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3805` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-object-path - 0.11.4-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-object-path package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.11.4-2ubuntu0.1').
